DataElement.preferredName: Patient Household Family Member Residence Description Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the quantity of persons living in the household.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Household Family Member Residence Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to description of patient's family member residence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes. Household is a common unit for classifying population data.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.

Property.preferredDefinition: A member of the fundamental unit of society designed primarily to regulate sexual behavior and reproduce, nurture, protect, and socialize the youngs, traditionally organized around kinship ties, descend from the common progenitor or related by marriage or by a feeling of closeness; or of any of various social units differing from but regarded as equivalent to the traditional family.:Residence; the place where a person lives.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.

Concepts.definition: Any of the individuals who are descended from a common progenitor, related by marriage or other legal tie, or by a feeling of closeness.
Any address at which a person dwells more than temporarily.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/11/17 tt transferred context, added reg status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task.
